articles.author: Kate Whitfield
articles.title: Covid CHAOS: Europe in crisis as terrifying chart shows cases SOARING - and UK is worst - Daily Express
articles.description: COVID-19 cases are on the rise yet again across Europe, as lockdowns come and go and the Delta variant rages on. Now, a terrifying chart has shown just how dire the situation really is.

articles.author: Nadine Schmidt and Schams Elwazer, CNN
articles.title: At least 6 killed in Germany as flooding caused by rainfall 'not seen in 100 years' hits Europe - CNN
articles.description: Torrential rain has caused severe floods in several western European countries, including Germany -- where at least six people have died -- as well as in Belgium, Luxembourg and the Netherlands.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Top EU court rules hijab can be banned at work - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: European Union court rules companies may ban Muslim employees from wearing a headscarf under certain conditions.
articles.content:
The European Unions top court has ruled that employers may forbid the wearing of visible symbols of religious or political belief, such as headscarves.
But the Luxembourg-based tribunal said in its … [+3185 chars]

articles.title: More than 20 people dead, dozens missing after heavy floods in Europe - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Heavy flooding in Germany and Belgium turned streams and streets into raging torrents, sweeping away cars and causing some buildings to collapse.
articles.content: More than 30 people have died and dozens of people are missing in Germany and neighbouring Belgium after heavy flooding turned streams and streets into raging torrents, sweeping away cars and causing… [+6594 chars]

articles.title: Europe is provoking the world with its controversial plan to fight climate change - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The European Union has announced the world’s most ambitious response to climate change, and the US and China are not far behind.
